abstracts.cdata!:
The project would assist the Government
            to formulate an integrated program for the development of
            the forest resources of the Hazara region of the North West
            Frontier Province (NWFP). To that end, the project would
            help to develop improved technologies in reforestation,
            reinforce the Forest Department of the NWFP and other
            agencies, and prepare follow-up projects for large-scale
            reforestation and an integrated pulp and paper industry. The
            project would: select suitable areas for large-scale
            reforestation by systematic site assessment; update
            inventory of existing forests; plant 2,000 ha of pilot
            plantations with back-up research trials and a genetic
            improvement program; finance a training program; develop
            work arrangements to embrace private small-scale forest
            owners in future development; finance pulping tests and a
            feasibility study to define the type, configuration and
            timing of pulp and paper industrial development; and set up
            a management unit to coordinate activities and prepare
            follow-up projects.
